title: [Like Nobody's Watching, Men's]
description: Unlike the entry, this room is airy and well-lit with a variety of ensconced candles.  Wide windows are cut in the silk walls and protected by awnings so as not to let any rain enter the room, yet allowing plenty of moonlight.  A long black marble counter encompasses the center of the floor, its surface displaying a variety of footwear and a propped-up, discreet white wooden sign.  Against the back wall, several shelves hold clothing and accessories for men.
